h1.base: margin: 32px 0 20px; font-size: 2em; line-height: 1.5; text-align: left; padding-left: 15px; border-left: 5px solid #6200EA;
h1.content: display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; color: #311B92; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 1px;

h2.base: margin: 28px 0 16px; font-size: 1.5em; line-height: 1.5; background: #F3E5F5; padding: 5px 10px; border-radius: 4px;

h3.content: font-weight: bold; color: #651FFF; padding-bottom: 2px; border-bottom: 2px solid #B388FF; display: inline-block;

header.container: margin-bottom: 1em; display: flex; gap: 6px; background: #263238; padding: 8px 10px; border-top-left-radius: 6px; border-top-right-radius: 6px;

code.block: color: #ECEFF1; background: #263238; border-bottom-left-radius: 6px; border-bottom-right-radius: 6px; margin: 0 0 1.2em 0; padding: 1em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap; margin-top: -1em;
code.inline: background: #EDE7F6; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; color: #6200EA; font-size: 14px; border: 1px solid #D1C4E9; font-weight: bold;

styles.quote: border-left: 4px solid #6200EA; padding: 10px 15px; background: #F3E5F5; margin: 0.8em 0; color: #4A148C; font-style: italic;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1em auto; display: block; border: 2px solid #6200EA; box-shadow: 4px 4px 0px #B388FF;
styles.link: color: #6200EA; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 2px solid #6200EA; font-weight: bold;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1em 0; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #B39DDB;
table.header: background: #EDE7F6; font-weight: bold; color: #4A148C; border-bottom: 2px solid #B39DDB; font-size: 1em;
